title: Reduce Motion Sickness While Using Your iPhone or iPad During a Car Ride with Vehicle Motion Cues
description: If scrolling through your phone during a car ride makes you feel queasy, you're not alone. Motion sickness often occurs when your inner ear senses movement but your eyes focus on something stationary — like your iPhone's screen. Apple's Vehicle Motion Cues feature aims to alleviate this discomfort with subtle, dynamic on-screen visuals that sync with your vehicle's movements. Vehicle Motion Cues use animated dots along the edges of your screen to represent the motion of your car, helping your brain and body more effectively align with the sensation of movement. These nonintrusive cues allow... more
author: Cory Bohon

title: Apple Just Made Voice Memos Better with Layered Recording — Here's How It Works on iPhone 16 Pro
description: Apple introduced layered recordings in Voice Memos back in September, and the feature finally arrived with the latest update for the iPhone 16 Pro and 16 Pro Max. This exciting addition transforms the app into a versatile tool for musicians and storytellers, making it easier than ever to craft songs, narrations, or other creative projects. Imagine recording an instrumental track, then seamlessly layering vocals or a voiceover on top. Or take a lyric-filled recording and enhance it with live instruments. As you capture the second layer, the app lets you hear the first track through your... more

title: From Clutter to Creativity: How Sarah’s IKEA Hack Keeps Her Home Organized
description: Living in a cozy 60 m2 apartment with her husband and three young children, Sarah, a home organizer and stylist, knows the importance of making the most out of every inch of space. “I hate a cramped feeling,” she says, “but I love doing arts and crafts with my kiddies.”  This passion for creativity and order led her to hack an IKEA BISSA shoe cabinet, transforming it into a multifunctional storage solution that also cleverly conceals an internet router. Sarah’s […] The post From Clutter to Creativity: How Sarah’s IKEA Hack Keeps Her Home Organized appeared first on IKEA Hackers.

title: 12 Best IKEA Hacks of 2024: See IKEA in a Brand New Light!
description: 2024 has been interesting, with IKEA lowering prices across 63 countries. After years of steadily climbing costs, especially post-COVID due to supply chain issues, it’s a breath of fresh air to see IKEA passing some of these savings back to us. This is fantastic news for us, people who love hacking IKEA furniture. After all, one of the main reasons we DIY is because we want beautiful things on a budget.
